body_html:
This seems to be a bug with newer Bazel releases (maybe Bazel 0.5.3? not sure). I started having this with all my C++ projects that use Bazel. They all show these two warnings when compiling C++ files.

It looks like it adds these two flags when compiling with clang (I'm on Linux), even though it shouldn't.

@gunan marking you as you pointed these warnings on the duplicate bug.
